feed.title: Category: Duplicate | Dark Matter in Cyberspace

entry.title: Remove Duplicate Zsh History
entry.content:
To remove duplicate items in fzf prompt, add the following lines into ~/.zshrc:

setopt EXTENDED_HISTORY
setopt HIST_EXPIRE_DUPS_FIRST
setopt HIST_IGNORE_DUPS
setopt HIST_IGNORE_ALL_DUPS
setopt HIST_IGNORE_SPACE
setopt HIST_FIND_NO_DUPS
setopt HIST_SAVE_NO_DUPS
setopt HIST_BEEP

Ref:

Preventing duplicate lines in the history

https://github.com/mattjj/my-oh-my-zsh/blob/master/history.zsh

zsh options

entry.title: 查找重复文件并删除的工具
entry.content:
AllDup的Portable版：AllDupPortable.zip，今天用它查找重复的电子书，效果良好。

基本使用方法是：在"Source Folder"里选择要查找重复文件的文件夹，例如e:\mydoc\books，然后在"Search Criteria"里设置好判定为相同文件的条件，一般选择文件名和大小相同，然后点"Start Search"按钮就开始查找了。

此类软件介绍见http://www.freewaregenius.com/easily-find-and-remove-duplicate-files-with-alldup-for-windows/%E3%80%82
